name: Catcher (itch) (le_maxy)
description:
(sorry for my broken english lol)

Hi, i created my first arcade "Catcher - Free Arcade Game" and you can find it on Google Play.

Rules are simple. You just need to drag your catcher to collect coins. If you dont catch 3 coins or catch a bomb, you lose.

My game doesnt require internet connection, cuz this is offline solo game.

Also, i update this game when i have free time, so... you can get some cool things when i release new updates :D

If you are interested, please download "Catcher - Free Arcade Game" on Google Play and review it <3
(if something is wrong with my game tell me about it in review section)
